title: Duo out of Bronze LFP

replies.body: Add me, last season was silver 4 and I know the feeling im climbing pretty fast atm just having trouble every now and then.

Hi,
Bronze 4 mid main, I play
{{champion:1}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:103}}  as Mid
{{champion:75}} {{champion:114}}  as Top
{{champion:25}} {{champion:89}}  as Support
{{champion:104}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:22}}  as ADC
and
{{champion:76}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:28}}  as Jungle
Summoner name is Jollzstar, on most days, send me a request.

>and i keep getting demoted after my first game in a new rank

Cause you know, this is totally possible.

I'm a bronze 5 support main, i play:
 {{champion:267}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:1}}  as support, 
{{champion:127}} {{champion:114}} Top lane
{{champion:1}} {{champion:157}}  Mid lane
{{champion:104}} {{champion:222}}  ADC
And {{champion:35}} Jungle.
Got skype and curse.
I'll keep my client up all day, just send a request, ill tell you my skype/curse once i notice.
